channel.title: Toronto on repl.ca
channel.description: Recent content in Toronto on repl.ca

item.title: Perceptions of Toronto
item.description:
Growing up on the east coast of Canada, this is how I imagined Toronto to be, like, 24⁄7.

I’ve been here for nine months or so, and have yet to be invited to any trendy VICE parties. Just so you know, VICE, I am very willing to grow out some stubble and wear vintage clothing or an ironic t-shirt for the event.

Toronto is great though, even without the free Red Stripe.

item.title: Our Home and Native Land
item.description:
At the end of August, Cherie and I (and the cats) will be moving to Toronto. I’ll still be working with Red Hat on RHN; we just decided it was time to return to our own Country.

It should be good times.
